author.bio: Infinitbility is a tech blog created with the sole purpose of explaining complex tech in a simple and concise way thus creating value for budding developers out there.
author.name: Infinitbility

group.title: App crashed immediately after install react native video or track player
group.author: Infinitbility
group.excerpt: In this article, we figure out the solution of the conflict issues of video and track players.

group.title: React Native Font Family list
group.author: Infinitbility
group.excerpt: In this article, we discuss about react native fonts, fonts list, custom fonts, and fonts ttf files.

import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { AppRegistry, ScrollView, Text, StyleSheet} from 'react-native';

styles=StyleSheet.create({
    scroller: {
        flex: 1,
    }
});

export default class AndroidFonts extends Component{
  render (){
    return(
      <ScrollView style={styles.scroller}>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'normal'}}>  normal </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'notoserif'}}>  notoserif </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'sans-serif'}}>  sans-serif </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'sans-serif-light'}}>  sans-serif-light </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'sans-serif-thin'}}>  sans-serif-thin </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'sans-serif-condensed'}}>  sans-serif-condensed </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'sans-serif-medium'}}>  sans-serif-medium </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'serif'}}>  serif </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'Roboto'}}>  Roboto </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'monospace'}}>  monospace </Text>        
      </ScrollView>
    );
  }
}

AppRegistry.registerComponent('AndroidFonts', () => AndroidFonts);

")), mdx("h2", {

import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { AppRegistry, ScrollView, Text, StyleSheet} from 'react-native';

    scroller: {
        flex: 1,
    }
});

export default class AndroidFonts extends Component{

    return(
      <ScrollView style={styles.scroller}>
        {/* put file name on fontFamily without .ttf extansion */}
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'Arial'}}>  Arial </Text>       
      </ScrollView>
    );
  }
}

AppRegistry.registerComponent('AndroidFonts', () => AndroidFonts);
